disease: Basal cell carcinoma of skin of left upper eyelid, including canthus

symptoms.name: Visible or palpable mass
symptoms.pattern: Present in most cases with orbital invasion

symptoms.name: Mass fixation to orbital bone
symptoms.pattern: Present in some cases with orbital invasion

symptoms.name: Limitation of ocular motility
symptoms.pattern: Present in some cases with orbital invasion

symptoms.name: Globe displacement
symptoms.pattern: Present in some cases with orbital invasion

symptoms.name: Immobile lids
symptoms.pattern: Present in some cases with orbital invasion

symptoms.name: Epiphora
symptoms.pattern: Present in some cases with orbital invasion

symptoms.name: Ptosis
symptoms.pattern: Present in some cases with orbital invasion

physical_findings: Central ulcerated crater with pearly rolled margins (nodular type)
White-pink to yellow plaque with indistinct clinical margins (morpheaform type)

imaging_findings.MRI: Visualizing soft tissue changes and perineural invasion
imaging_findings.IVCM: High sensitivity and specificity for eyelid margin tumors

supportive: Clinical presentation (pearly edge, pink color, ulceration, bleeding)
